posts.post_title: Old Judge N172 Ward SGC 84 - Amazing!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt Goebel
This is by far the nicest Old Judge card I have ever seen.  The image is spectacular, the surfaces are nice and clean, and it is even perfectly centered.  $7500 delivered and scans are available upon request.

Matt
